meanings.definition: The act of attacking someone in a public place and stealing their money or possessions.
meanings.sent1: The mugging in the park left the victim scared and without their wallet.
meanings.sent2: She was a victim of a mugging on her way home from work.
meanings.sent3: The clumsy mugging attempt ended with the thief tripping over his own feet.
meanings.sent4: The mugging of the old building for its historical artifacts was a violation of its past.
meanings.sent5: The news of the mugging spread quickly through the small town.

meanings.definition: A physical assault or robbery committed in a public place.
meanings.sent1: After the mugging, he reported the incident to the police.
meanings.sent2: The mugging took place late at night when the streets were empty.
meanings.sent3: The mugging turned into a chase scene straight out of a movie.
meanings.sent4: The mugging of the store shelves by the kids for candy was caught on camera.
meanings.sent5: The vivid description of the mugging was enough to make everyone in the room uneasy.
